entity.name: property_space
entity.description: A property_space is a type of general_property and class that is a Property_space (as defined in the ARM).

entity.name: standard_tensor_order_and_symmetry
entity.description: A standard_tensor_order_and _symmetry is a type of tensor_order_and_symmetry_by_library_reference that is a Standard_tensor_order_and_symmetry (as defined in the ARM).

where.label: valid_standard_class
where.description: The supplier shall be 'ISO-TS-10303-1080', and the code shall be one of those listed in Table 1.

entity.name: tensor_order_and_symmetry
entity.description: A tensor_order_and_symmetry is a type of general_property and class that is a tensor_order_and_symmetry (as defined in the ARM).

entity.name: tensor_order_and_symmetry_by_library_reference
entity.description: A tensor_order_and_symmetry_by_library_reference is a type of tensor_order_and_symmetry and externally_defined_item that is a Tensor_order_and_symmetry_by_library_reference (as defined in the ARM).

entity.name: tensor_order_and_symmetry_for_property_space
entity.description: A tensor_order_and_symmetry_for_property_space is a type of general_property_relationship that is a Tensor_order_and_symmetry_for_property_space (as defined in the ARM).

explicit.name: relating_property
explicit.description: the tensor_order_and_symmetry that indicates the tensor order and symmetry.

explicit.name: related_property
explicit.description: an independent_property_definition that has the tensor order and symmetry indicated.
